attributes.additional_details:
As a concerned welsh citizen, I find that due to the possible further cuts to the welsh speaking TV channel (S4C) the language itself might be in jeopardy of decreasing, we don't have much welsh material as it is in Wales and this would be damaging for our future and our children's future, by cutting funds to a welsh speaking channel you are denying our freedom, i find it unfair to deny us a channel that speaks our language when other channels in English are broad-casted with trivial stuff that is not important.
I want you to re-think what is important and keep S4C running.

rejection.details: Closed at the request of petitioner
